name: Boots of Ice
data: It increases the users strength a tiny bit.
It increases the users dexterity a tiny bit.
It increases the users constitution a tiny bit.
It decreases the users intelligence adequately.
It has adequate armour class for its type (tiny in general).
It allows the user to see in darkness.
It increases the users hitpoint regeneration pitifully.
This item loses its magical powers very fast.
